# Xerxes

𒂗 𒂗𒂗 En En.en lord of lords, king of kings

Nominative singular of *Xšayā-r̥šān- literally “ruling over heroes”[1], from *xšay- literally “to rule” + *r̥šān- hero
from Proto-Indo-European *tek- “to take, obtain” and Proto-Indo-European *wérsēn “male”.
Proper noun

𐎧𐏁𐎹𐎠𐎼𐏁𐎠 x-š-y-a-r-š-a /Xšayār̥šā/ m

Xerxes

Descendants
